verses.content: LALPA siehlaw Mosie chu a thi hnung chun, Mosie rawngbâwltu Nun naupa Josua kuoma chun LALPAIN,
“Ka siehlaw Mosie chu a thi tah a; tho la, nang le hieng mipui po pohai le hin Jordan hi kân unla, anni Israel thlahai ngei ka ipêk rama chun fe ro.
Mosie kuoma ka hril ta ang khan, in kephaa in isir taphawt chu ka pêk vawng cheu a nih.
Thlalêra inthawk le hi Lebanon tlânga inthawka Euphrates vadung, vadung lientak chen, Hit mihai ram po po, nisa tlâkna tieng tuisuoriet lientak chen in ramri nîng a ta.
I dam sûng po po chun tukhawm i hmaah ngîr thei naw ni hai a, Mosie kuoma ka um ang khan i kuoma khawm ka um ve ding a nih; inhlâw- samtir naw ning cheh a, mâk khawm mâksan naw tawp ka ti che.
Hrâttak le huoitakin um rawh, inkhâma an thlatuhai pêk ka lo tiem ta ram kha anni hi în hluotir ding a ni sih a.

Ka siehlaw Mosiein dân po po zâwm dinga a pêk che kha zâwm tlat dingin hrâttak le huoitakin um phawt el rawh. I fena taphawta i tluongtlung peina dingin i changtieng amanih, i vawitieng amaniha khawm pêtsan dêr naw rawh.

Hi dân bu hin i bâu chu suoksan hlek naw sienla, chu thu ziekhai po po chu i zâwm tlat theina dingin sûn le zânin i ngaituo ding a nih, chuong- chun, i lampuihai chu suktluong pei i ta; i hung tluongtlung pei ding a nih. Thu ka pêk che a ni naw am a nih?
Hrâttak le huoitakin um rawh; ṭi naw la, zâm bawk naw rawh, LALPA i Pathien chu i fena taphawtah i kuomah a um pei ding annâwm,” tiin, a hril a.
Chuongchun, Josua chun mipui hotuhai chu thu a pêk a,

“Riebûk chu va fang unla, mi- puihai kuoma chun, ‘Fâk dinghai buot- sai ro khai, ni thum sûngin LALPA in Pathienin ram hluo ding a pêk cheu hi hluo dingin Jordan vadung hi in kân ding a nih,’ tiin thu pe ro,” tiin.
Chun, Reuben mihai le, Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtvehai kuoma chun Josua chun,
“LALPA in Pathienin châwlna a pêk cheu a, hi ram hi a la pêk ding cheu a nih, tia LALPA siehlaw Mosien thu a pêk cheu hi hre zing unla.

In nuhmeihai, in nau le tehai le in ran ruolhai hi chu Jordan râla Mosien ram a lo pêka cheu chun um an ta; nangni mi hrât huoihai po chu inrâlthuomin lo kai hmasâng in ta, in unauhai lo ṭhangpui in ta;

LALPAIN in unauhai khawm chu nangni ang bawka châwlna a pêka, LALPA in Pathienin ram a pêk chu anni khawma an hluo ve hma- khat chun; chuongchun, LALPA sie- hlaw Mosien Jordan râl, nisa suokna tieng ram in puola a lo pêk ta cheu tieng chun kîr nâwk in ta, in la hluo ding a nih,” tiin, a hril a.
Anni chun Josua chu an dawn a, “Thaw dinga i thu mi pêkhai po po chu thaw pei kan tih.
Kawng iengkima Mosie thu kan zâwm pei hlak ang khan, i thu khawm zâwm pei kan tih. LALPA i Pathien chu Mosie kuoma a um hlak ang khan i kuoma hin um ve phawt sienla.
Tukhawm i thupêk chunga hela, thu i pêk taphawt zâwm nuom lo chu sukhlum ding nîng an tih, hrâttak le huoitakin um phawt el rawh,” tiin.
